name: lenses-json-schemas
description: JSON Schemas for Lenses Agent Provisioning Configuration

scripts.validate-iam: ajv compile -s iam/group.schema.json -s iam/policy.schema.json -s iam/service-account.schema.json -s iam/user.schema.json --spec=draft7 --strict=false --all-errors
scripts.validate-yaml-example: js-yaml example.provisioning.yaml > temp.json && ajv validate -s agent/provisioning.schema.json -d temp.json --spec=draft7 --strict=false && rm temp.json
scripts.test: npm run validate-agent && npm run validate-iam && npm run format-check && npm run validate-yaml-example

author: Lenses
